args: Use arrow keys to move the cursor. See the **key map** to the right for more.

# Welcome to OCell!

OCell is a 'cell based' programming language: it works like a spreadsheet, but instead of the cells being in a grid they are referred to by name.

Like a spreadsheet, updating the value of a cell also automatically updates any of its dependent cells. There is no separate 'run' step.

The OCell editor is a structural editor, which means you edit the *syntax tree* of an expression instead of text.

<u>**OCell is a work in progress:**</u>

* Your projects **may become unreadable** as the underlying schema changes.
* Mouse support is currently very limited/non-existant.
* Mobile browsers are not currently tested or supported.
* Editing commands are still limited, so you may find the structural editor frustrating. I hope you can see the potential!
* I'll post updates to [my Twitter](https://twitter.com/KPMTechnically).
